title: The Real Christmas Gift: A True Story
description: A true story of how five sisters changed Christmas for their sweet mother.♥For eleven-year-old Bonnie Greenhalgh, the Christmas of 1966 would be forever remembered as the year she learned about the real gift of Christmas. Bonnie and her four sisters, living with their single mother in a cramped apartment, came up with a plan to make Christmas special. Although it seemed an impossible task to find a coat for their mother, when they laid all they had at the feet of a stranger, she turned it into a Christmas miracle.  This story will touch the heartstrings of all who read of the remarkable bicycle ride through the snow to find the perfect gift for a beloved mother.
author: Rachelle J. Christensen
